topic: Build Your Personal Learning OS: PARA, Zettelkasten, and Atomic Notes
target_audience: students and knowledge workers organizing notes and projects

refs.content: Projects–Areas–Resources–Archives as a universal information architecture to reduce friction and resurface relevant notes.

refs.ref_string: Ahrens (2017) How to Take Smart Notes
refs.content: Zettelkasten method: atomic, linked notes; focus on writing to learn and building a network of ideas.
Evergreen notes as durable, concept-centered units; prompts for active elaboration and spaced repetition.

special_instructions: Offer migration checklist from messy folders; map PARA↔Zettelkasten workflows; include a 30-minute weekly review script.
